about_the_game:
How far would you go to come back to life?

You are an everyday office worker, living a peaceful life and looking forward to getting married. Your life is turned upside down when you are suddenly involved in a fatal accident.
When you open your eyes, a stranger who claims to be the devil stands before you and promises to bring you back to life. All you have to do is accept his terms and vow to become his assistant.

Your binding contract sets off a chain of events that will lead you down a path of betrayal, lost love, greed, family strife, curses, and ultimate decisions that could change not only your life, but the fate of those around you.

Immerse yourself in a mysterious story where you make the choices and decide the ultimate fate of others!

Comino is a new graphic novel app that aims to share many different types of stories, whether it is mystery, romance, thriller, supernatural, slice-of-life, young love, or others, there is sure to be something for you!

Our team is currently working on updating the apps to improve translations and localizations, in-app purchases, UI fixes, and more. Stay tuned for updates on your favorite stories and new releases!

▼ Features ▼
- Choose your story! Dive in and start making decisions that affect the overall outcome!
- Adventures begin with you choosing your name and style to reflect your personality.
- Your own story that you can easily play with just one touch.
- Satisfying amount of scenarios.
The content of the story changes depending on your own choices.
- You can read it to the end for free.

Recommended for such people.
People who like visual novels
・People who like games with stories and scenarios, novel games, and adventure games
People who like stories such as manga, anime, drama, and movies
People who like serious stories such as suspense, horror, mystery, and revenge.
People who like spiritual things such as demons, souls, and fate.
People who want to read something intense.
People who want to play a supernatural adventure horror visual novel story game.
People who want to read short stories in English.
People who like interactive story game in English
People who want to find Story Game without Internet
People who want to play free games in their spare time

About love simulation game "Comino Series
Comino is a romance love story simulation / otome game where you can easily enjoy stories with a free smartphone app.
A story interactive romance game for women where you can enjoy romance with unique Ikemen, a popular free romance game with a cumulative total of 1,000,000 downloads worldwide.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GTX580
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

Recommended:
  • OS: windows 10/11
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GTX580
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
